title: A Gent from Bear Creek
description: Hillbilly Breckenridge Elkins tells of his quiet life, fighting in the neighborhood. "A Gent from Bear Creek" is the title of both an original short story, and a novel created by combining several already published short stories with new material. Published stories were altered a little to create chapters with a continuous story line.Chapters are: 1 Striped Shirts and Busted Hearts (new)2 Mountain Man3 Meet Cap'n Kidd (new)4 Guns of the Mountains5 A Gent from Bear Creek6 The Feud Buster7 The Road to Bear Creek8 The Scalp Hunter9 Cupid from Bear Creek10 The Haunted Mountain11 Educate or Bust (new)12 War on Bear Creek13 When Bear Creek Came to Chawed Ear (new).
author: Robert E. Howard
